mean_en: (used only in infinitives and in orders) if you tell somebody to beware, you are warning them that somebody/something is dangerous and that they should be careful
sentence: Passers-by are warned to beware of the wet floor.
sentence_trans: 过路行人被提醒要小心地滑。
word_etyma: be使…成为 + ware注意 → beware注意
